member.name: T:VectSharp.MuPDFUtils.ImageURIParser
member.summary: Provides a method to parse an image URI into a page.

member.name: M:VectSharp.MuPDFUtils.ImageURIParser.Parser(System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean,VectSharp.Page})
member.summary: Parses an image URI into a page. This is intended to replace the default image URI interpreter in VectSharp.SVG.Parser.ParseImageURI. To do this, use something like: VectSharp.SVG.Parser.ParseImageURI = VectSharp.MuPDFUtils.ImageURIParser.Parser(VectSharp.SVG.Parser.ParseSVGURI);
member.param: A function to parse an SVG image uri into a page. You should pass VectSharp.SVG.Parser.ParseSVGURI as this argument.
member.returns: A function to parse an image URI into a page.

member.name: M:VectSharp.MuPDFUtils.RasterImageFile.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new from the specified file.
member.param: The path to the file containing the image.
The number of the page in the file from which the image should be created, starting at 0. Only useful for multi-page formats, such as PDF.
The scale factor at which to render the image.
A boolean value indicating whether transparency (alpha) data from the image should be preserved or not.
A boolean value indicating whether the image should be interpolated when it is resized or not.

member.name: M:VectSharp.MuPDFUtils.RasterImageStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,MuPDFCore.InputFileTypes,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new from the specified stream.
member.param: The stream containing the image data.
The type of the image contained in the stream.
The number of the page in the file from which the image should be created, starting at 0. Only useful for multi-page formats, such as PDF.
The scale factor at which to render the image.
A boolean value indicating whether transparency (alpha) data from the image should be preserved or not.
A boolean value indicating whether the image should be interpolated when it is resized or not.

member.name: M:VectSharp.MuPDFUtils.RasterImageStream.#ctor(System.IntPtr,System.Int64,MuPDFCore.InputFileTypes,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new from the specified stream.
member.param: A pointer to the address where the image data is contained.
The length in bytes of the image data.
The type of the image contained in the stream.
The number of the page in the file from which the image should be created, starting at 0. Only useful for multi-page formats, such as PDF.
The scale factor at which to render the image.
A boolean value indicating whether transparency (alpha) data from the image should be preserved or not.
A boolean value indicating whether the image should be interpolated when it is resized or not.
